item.title: Hugo tricks
item.description: How to make Hugo render drafted content? Here you could find source for this advice/ Add option to config.toml: title = "Hugo example site" baseurl = "https://www.example.com" buildDrafts = true Generate drafted files during the current Hugo build hugo server --buildDrafts or hugo server -D To not generate draft content when building our static website, use one of the following command flags: hugo --buildDrafts=false hugo -D=false hugo -D=F
item.content:
How to make Hugo render drafted content?

Here you could find source for this advice/

  1. Add option to config.toml:
title = "Hugo example site"
baseurl = "https://www.example.com"
buildDrafts = true
  1. Generate drafted files during the current Hugo build
hugo server --buildDrafts

or

hugo server -D

To not generate draft content when building our static website, use one of the following command flags:

hugo --buildDrafts=false
hugo -D=false
hugo -D=F
